name: agentic-browser-monorepo
description: Full-stack Agentic Browser Plugin WebApp with Python/FastAPI and Node.js/NestJS backends

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "pnpm --filter backend-python dev" "pnpm --filter backend-node dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter backend-python build && pnpm --filter backend-node build
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter backend-python install && pnpm --filter backend-node install
